Hi all,

I have a question regarding both versions. 

In heritrix 1.14.4, w=
e can create jobs and add them to the queue. Then once the current active j=
ob is finished next will automatically start. Therefore, I used this featur=
e and modified relevant functions in the heritrix 1.14.4 source code in ord=
er to crawl jobs continuously.


So my question is, in heritrix 3.1.0, is t=
here this type of functionality?
